page.title: 19PARISH COUNCIL,LONGTOWN
page.content: Members of the council are elected every four years.It has fifteen members who must be nominated and seconded.The Carlisle District Council organise the election.There are ten meetings a year held in the Longtown Library.The council is responsible for such matters as,allotments,recreation, footpaths,litter.It oversees the use of 75 main allotments and 12 temporary ones.Iniatives taken by the Parish Council helped obtain funds from the Sports Council,to finance the building of the All-Weather-Courts.The council is consulted by the District Council for its views on planning applications .The Council has to precept for financial requirements every year.The council makes grants to the following bodies:-Evergreen Club,Luncheon Club, Bowling Club,Horticultural Society,& pays the electricity bill of the Y.C.
